item.description:
Conard courts are being used on the 20th so we'll return to the courts at Buena Vista. They are located on Cornerstone Drive in W.H. There are no houses on this road but it's right behind Cornerstone Aquatic Center, Veterans Rink and Buena Vista Golf course and near Solomon Schechter school. Last week there was a school group playing but they finished at 5:30.
My number is 559---7983 if you have questions or comments. Thanks

group.name: The West Hartford Over 40 Fun Bunch!

item.name: Wednesday NIght Tennis @ Buena Vista W.H.
